meanings.definition: A decorative band or ring on a vase or other object.
meanings.sent1: The euphroe on the vase was beautifully painted with flowers.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design of the euphroe on the antique vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the vase, shattering the delicate euphroe.
meanings.sent4: The euphroe on the vase was like a crown, adding elegance to the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The golden euphroe gleamed under the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A circular or oval ornament on a piece of furniture.
meanings.sent1: The euphroe on the table was carved with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: The antique dresser had a beautiful euphroe on its top.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to spin the euphroe on the chair for fun.
meanings.sent4: The euphroe on the cabinet seemed to watch over the room like a guardian.
meanings.sent5: The euphroe on the chair added a touch of elegance to the simple room decor.

meanings.definition: A decorative molding or band on a building.
meanings.sent1: The euphroe on the old building was weathered but still beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The architect included a unique euphroe in the design of the building.
meanings.sent3: The birds perched on the euphroe of the building, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The euphroe on the building stood out like a crown jewel in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the euphroe added charm to the historic building.
